definition: self-indulgent sexual desire (personified as one of the deadly sins), have a craving, appetite, or great desire for
details:
noun
- self-indulgent sexual desire (personified as one of the deadly sins)
= synonyms: luxuria
- a strong sexual desire
= synonyms: lustfulness, lecherousness
verb
- have a craving, appetite, or great desire for
= synonyms: hunger, thirst, crave, starve
